categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Andrew Havill is a British actor who portrays a First Order officer in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. Other roles of note include Johns Hotchkiss in the 2012 science fiction film Cloud Atlas, the head of the BBC Sound Department in the 2010 historical drama The King's Speech, Helena Bonham Carter's fiance in the 2002 British drama film The Heart of Me, The Equerry in the Sherlock episode "A Scandal in Belgravia", and a reverend in the Midsomer Murders episode "The Night of the Stag".
